A Comprehensive Range of Masonry Services Tailored to Your Needs

Residential Masonry Services in New York City

Transform your living space with the timeless elegance and enduring strength of masonry. Our skilled craftsmen specialize in a wide range of residential masonry services in New York City, catering to both your aesthetic and functional needs.

Brick & Stonework: Installation, repair, and restoration of all types of brick, stone veneer, and decorative stonework for a touch of classic charm or modern flair.

Fireplaces & Chimneys: Design and build custom fireplaces that add warmth and ambiance to your home. Our expertise also covers chimney cleaning, inspections, and repairs to ensure safety and optimal performance.

Patios & Walkways: Create beautiful and durable outdoor living spaces with a variety of paver options, walkways, and retaining walls. Our skilled masons can craft unique designs that seamlessly integrate with your home's architecture and landscaping.

Driveway & Sidewalk Repair: Restore the functionality and safety of your driveway and sidewalks with expert repairs for cracks, unevenness, or settling. We ensure your property maintains a beautiful and well-maintained appearance.

Pointing & Tuckpointing: Rejuvenate the look of your brickwork by replacing weathered mortar joints with fresh, high-quality pointing material. This process not only enhances aesthetics but also improves the structural integrity of your masonry.

Stucco Repair & Restoration: Restore the beauty and weather resistance of your home's exterior stucco with professional repairs and maintenance.

Window Sill & Lintel Repair: Address cracks and deterioration in window sills and lintels to maintain the structural integrity and aesthetics of your home.

Thorocoat & Thoroseal Applications: Protect your property from water damage with the application of specialized masonry coatings that enhance the water resistance and durability of your brick and concrete surfaces.

); }; export default MasonryDetails;
